document_data.name: Knee-Cracker
document_data.mainbody:
'''Knee-Cracker''' was a cider crafted in [[Daggerford]], [[Faerûn]]. It was also sold through [[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]].

{{quote|If you drink it down too fast, you'll end up on your knees, begging the gods for aid and swearing you'll never touch the stuff again.|[[Demetira Landscraper]]<ref name="NWNDoD9"  />}}
document_data.Description:
Made from windfall [[apple]]s, Knee-Cracker cider possessed heavy sediment. It was suggested to let a container of Knee-Cracker sit for three days upon receipt to allow the sediment to settle.

This cider was a flavorful cloudy beverage that was stronger than ale but weaker than wine.
document_data.Prices:
Knee-Cracker could be purchased in the following containers:
* Hand keg (1 [[sp]])
* Cask (4 sp)
* Barrel (1 [[gp]])
* [[Butt]] (35 sp)
* [[Tun]] (8 gp)
